title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-2.7 - Definition of sanitization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-2.7 - Definition of sanitization

State Regulations

Sanitization means effective bactericidal treatment by heat or chemical means, acceptable to the permit-issuing official, which destroys pathogens on surfaces treated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-2.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
